<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream">formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> - A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> that wraps another one and keeps track of line and column position, allowing padding out to specific column boundaries and querying the number of lines written to the stream. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream - A raw&#95;ostream that wraps another one and keeps track</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of line and column position, allowing padding out to specific column</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// boundaries and querying the number of lines written to the stream. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// assumes that the contents of the stream is valid UTF-8 encoded text. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// doesn&#39;t attempt to handle everything Unicode can do (combining characters,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// right-to-left markers, etc), but should cover the cases likely to appear in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// source code or diagnostic messages.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#adb8a7ef601b3598707e6ae9a6c9f6e4d">formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f4b64a0f7aec0a02e7f2ff5a6552723">raw&#95;ostream</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// next call to ComputePosition. This is needed when the buffer is flushed</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream - Open the specified file for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// writing. If an error occurs, information about the error is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// put into ErrorInfo, and the stream should be immediately</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// destroyed; the string will be empty if no error occurred.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// As a side effect, the given Stream is set to be Unbuffered.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is because formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream does its own buffering,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// so it doesn&#39;t want another layer of buffering to be happening</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// underneath it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#adb8a7ef601b3598707e6ae9a6c9f6e4d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#adb8a7ef601b3598707e6ae9a6c9f6e4d">formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f4b64a0f7aec0a02e7f2ff5a6552723">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;Stream)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : TheStream(nullptr), Position(0, 0), DisableScan(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    setStream(Stream);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a91b597f0ba8945f847b8df2ff00e5880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">explicit</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a91b597f0ba8945f847b8df2ff00e5880">formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : TheStream(nullptr), Position(0, 0), Scanned(nullptr),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DisableScan(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a0eb361f836554627ef51810e0d3646c6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a0eb361f836554627ef51810e0d3646c6">~formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a520bdf57dfe3e73abb53d482893f0a27">flush</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    releaseStream();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// PadToColumn - Align the output to some column number.  If the current</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// column is already equal to or more than NewCol, PadToColumn inserts one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param NewCol - The column to move to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream">formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a1fc7f913807a21ba5a42df7cc2d2e748">PadToColumn</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewCol);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate current position, taking buffer contents into account.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ComputePosition(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a980ad6112624b521eb2d831b39b346eb">getBufferStart</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#ad6cd89674692383208613b1e4ee560fe">GetNumBytesInBuffer</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Position.first;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate current position, taking buffer contents into account.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ComputePosition(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a980ad6112624b521eb2d831b39b346eb">getBufferStart</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#ad6cd89674692383208613b1e4ee560fe">GetNumBytesInBuffer</a>());</span></CodeLine>
